entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
